description.raw:
REGRESSION_846_typo_in_camera has been [failing in Jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-raring-amd64/312/consoleFull) for machines without a GPU due to a recent change in pull request #830. This pull request makes that test require DRI, so it won't run on the machines without GPU's.

~~~
155: [ RUN      ] Issue846Test.CaptureData
155: 
155: [1;32mMsg[0m Waiting for master[1;32mMsg[0m Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
155: [1;32mMsg[0m Publicized address: 192.168.1.19
155: [1;31mError [RenderEngine.cc:636][0m Can't open display: 
155: [1;33mWarning [RenderEngine.cc:92][0m Unable to create X window. Rendering will be disabled
155: [1;36mDbg[0m ServerFixture load in 0.03 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
155: [1;31mError [ServerFixture.cc:199][0m Unable to load the rendering scene.
155: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-raring-amd64/gazebo/test/ServerFixture.cc:842: Failure
155: Failed
155: ServerFixture timeout (wait more than 0s): while waiting to load rendering scene
155: Test will failREGRESSION_846_typo_in_camera: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:424: T* boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::rendering::Scene]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.
~~~
I started a [gazebo-any job without a GPU to test this branch](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-raring-amd64-no-gpu/10/)

UPDATE: the [gazebo-any job for this branch](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-raring-amd64-no-gpu/10/) has all tests passing, though there were a few style errors on default, that I fixed in f60ea61.
description.html:
REGRESSION_846_typo_in_camera has been failing in Jenkins for machines without a GPU due to a recent change in pull request #830. This pull request makes that test require DRI, so it won't run on the machines without GPU's.

155: [ RUN      ] Issue846Test.CaptureData
155: 
155: [1;32mMsg[0m Waiting for master[1;32mMsg[0m Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
155: [1;32mMsg[0m Publicized address: 192.168.1.19
155: [1;31mError [RenderEngine.cc:636][0m Can't open display: 
155: [1;33mWarning [RenderEngine.cc:92][0m Unable to create X window. Rendering will be disabled
155: [1;36mDbg[0m ServerFixture load in 0.03 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
155: [1;31mError [ServerFixture.cc:199][0m Unable to load the rendering scene.
155: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-raring-amd64/gazebo/test/ServerFixture.cc:842: Failure
155: Failed
155: ServerFixture timeout (wait more than 0s): while waiting to load rendering scene
155: Test will failREGRESSION_846_typo_in_camera: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:424: T* boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::rendering::Scene]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.

I started a gazebo-any job without a GPU to test this branch

UPDATE: the gazebo-any job for this branch has all tests passing, though there were a few style errors on default, that I fixed in f60ea61.

title.raw: Fix 846 regression test by making it a DRI test

This pull request makes that test require DRI, so it won't run on the machines without GPU's.
